triennial._descr: full parashah with Ten Commandments every year

triennial-alt._descr: triennial divisions with Ten Commandments in years two and three

triennial._descr: with the Ten Commandments every year and the Sh'ma in years two and three

triennial-alt._descr: with the Ten Commandments in year two and the Sh'ma in year three

triennial._descr: When these Sidrot are not combined, they should each be read in their entirety.
When these Sidrot are not combined, they should each be read in their entirety.
